remarks: The zero of a unital ring is a left-absorbing element.  (Contributed by FL, 31-Aug-2009.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ringlz.1 $e |- Z = ( GId ` G ) $.
ringlz.2 $e |- X = ran G $.
ringlz.3 $e |- G = ( 1st ` R ) $.
ringlz.4 $e |- H = ( 2nd ` R ) $.
rngolz $p |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ A e. X ) -> ( Z H A ) = Z ) $.
